about.title: About Us
about.description1: YAKU CONSTRUCTION AND POOLS is a company specializing in renovations and swimming pool construction in Mallorca. We have been in the sector since 2003, so we guarantee that you will receive the utmost seriousness, responsibility, commitment, and professionalism from us, providing you with the best results in the work we do.
about.description2: Our reputation is built on client satisfaction, which is why we strive to exceed expectations on every project we undertake. Yaku Construction and Pools is the ideal choice for those seeking quality, professionalism, and commitment.
